label.name: Status: Blocked
label.description: Unable to progress currently due to internal/external blocker

label.name: Status: Up next
label.description: Issues likley to feature in the next sprint

label.name: Status: Revision needed
label.description: Submitter of PR needs to revise the PR related to the issue

label.name: Status: Wont fix
label.description: Issue will not be fixed, issue addressed in newer release and/or doesnt warrant fix

label.name: Type: Bug
label.description: Inconsistencies or issues which have caused a problem for users or implementors

label.name: Type: Documentation
label.description: Related to the docs site content

label.name: Type: Question
label.description: A query, or seeking clarification on parts of the spec

label.name: Design: Requires discussion
label.description: Design has been paused as it requires further discussion

label.name: Design: Signed off
label.description: When a design has been approved, add this tag to the issue

label.name: Tracking: ADO
label.description: This item is also being tracked in MS ADO Boards
